_header: O ye all that been or have been in disease
_description: A plea to lovers for sympathy — five stanzas rhyme royal

CamTCC599.First Lines:
[O] Ye all that ben or haue byn in dysseaseHelpe me to wepe or to
                    compleyneffor mysylf sorow haboundeth doutlesseThat hyt to wryte hit
                    passeth my power certayn…
CamTCC599.Last Lines:
…Whyche tweyne dayly done her laboureEuery trew louer to fle
                    and to deuoure
